players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Such a shocking start to the game with Alice gone! We need to think carefully about who could have done this."

Charlie: "Let's not jump to conclusions just yet, Diana. We don't have enough information to accuse anyone based on this single incident. Let's focus on gathering more clues and working together as a team."
You: "I agree with Charlie, let's not jump to conclusions based on one incident. We need to focus on gathering more information and working together as a team."
You: "Let's continue our investigation and gather more information to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. We should keep an open mind and not make any hasty accusations."
Diana: "Bob seems to be very eager to avoid any accusations. Why is that, Bob? Maybe you're trying to deflect attention from yourself?"

Charlie: "Let's not forget that we are all in this together as villagers. We need to work cooperatively and gather more information before making any accusations. Trust is important in our investigation, so let's focus on building trust within our team."

Bob was arrested
